<a id="BoxOccluder3D"></a>

# BoxOccluder3D

**Inherits:** [Occluder3D](Occluder3D.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Cuboid shape for use with occlusion culling in [OccluderInstance3D](OccluderInstance3D.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**BoxOccluder3D** stores a cuboid shape that can be used by the engine's occlusion culling system.

See [OccluderInstance3D](OccluderInstance3D.md)'s documentation for instructions on setting up occlusion culling.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Occlusion culling](../tutorials/3d/occlusion_culling.md)
